tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: McPixel [BONUS 2] - McPixel: A Life
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: To hone his skills for future point and click adventures, Jesse spends this week learning the magic and majesty that is indie darling McPixel. • Get epic OMFGCata gear! goo.gl or www.rodeoarcade.com • Stay connected! Twitter - twitter.com Facebook - facebook.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Wait, does the writing in McPixel's house﻿ say Dud? I'm now scared O.o
I love your﻿ old man impressions! Kills me everytime xD
No, he laughed at the old man. He had no reaction to﻿ the dick thing.

11:31 He makes a slight chuckle. 11:33 He laughs.
Try using headphones﻿ next time, bro.

Let's get this on steam people! go to comunity then greenlight﻿ and search "McPixel"
Thumbs up so people see it!!!
Lol when hes turning into sailor moon and lifts his left leg you can see his mcpenis﻿
@NightKolm Yeah he did﻿ say it in one of the fridays with PewDiePie.
It's not Lion King. It's﻿ Timon and Pumba.
Nobody even said﻿ anything about said, "Sea Men Jokes?"
Holy﻿ crap this is so hilarious xD
I propably wanted to﻿ reply to another person, meh.

Reviewer.Books: Not interested unless I have to read one. (does Nintendo magazine count as a book?)
Reviewer.Movies: i finished my page at 07:54 3rd august in the morning and i stayed up ALL NIGHT
Journey to the Center of the Earth
DBZ, Bleach, Saint Seiya, Fairy Tail

Reviewer.Music: Disturbed and Two Steps from Hell

Reviewer.Movies: DBZ, Bleach, Saint Seiya, Fairy Tail

Reviewer.Books: No favorites.. I do enjoy meh a good adventure tale!
Reviewer.Job: Right now, I dont have a job, I'm still in school. By the way, Algebra class is NOT fun.
Reviewer.Movies: I really dont have any favorite movies, I dont watch TV very often. I do like the Simpsons, something to whatch when I'm bored or have sat down to eat.
Reviewer.Music: Techno, just because its, well, different.
Reviewer.School: I go to SMS, Sparta Middle School, and I'm going for a full A student. I'm trying my best for a scholar ship, and If I succede... I'm going to try and go off and be a programmer. Ive always been facisnated by what you can create with a few lines of code.
